applicationProcedure: Log in on the official website
Enter name and mobile number for registration
Enter OTP for verification
Log in with username and password
Enter information and upload documents
Lock the application after save
Take printout of the application form and submit to the office of the District Backward Classes Welfare Officer
documents: Income Certificate
Caste Certificate
Intermediate Marks Sheet
Applicant photograph

response.schemeName: Dattopant Thengadi Mratak Shramik Aarthik Sahayata Yojana
applicationProcedure: Access the official website of the Uttar Pradesh Labour Welfare Board
Select the "Shramik Application" option from the homepage
Register New User and fill out the registration form
Log in to the portal and choose the relevant scheme
Complete the application form and upload a recent photograph
Submit the application form and obtain a printed copy
Present the application form at the concerned institution for verification and endorsement
Upload a scanned copy of the verified application form along with supporting documents
documents: Attested photocopy of the online filled application form
Read photocopy of the beneficiary's bank passbook
Read photocopy of ration card/family register or other government record
Death certificate issued by the Registrar (Birth/Death)

response.schemeName: Dr. APJ Abdul Kalam Shramik Pravidhik Shiksha Sahaayata Yojana
applicationProcedure: Access the official website of the Uttar Pradesh Labour Welfare Board
Select the "Shramik Application" option from the homepage
Register New User and fill out the registration form
Log in to the portal and choose the relevant scholarship scheme
Complete the application form, upload a recent photograph, and submit the application form
Present the application form at the concerned educational institution and the factory/establishment for verification and endorsement
Upload a scanned copy of the verified application form along with the required supporting documents
documents: Verified copy of the online filled application form
Photocopy of the passbook of the son/daughter or the worker
Photocopy of the certificate of admission or studying in technical education

response.schemeName: Financial Assistance to Former Sports Person of UP
applicationProcedure: Download the application form from the official website
Fill out the application form completely
Submit the duly filled application form along with necessary supporting documents to the respective sports officer of the concerned district
documents: Identity proof
Proof of age (Birth certificate)
Income certificate
Domicile certificate
Disability Certificate (if applicable)
Details of Sports competition/Championships of State, National & International importance covered by the applicant
Any other relevant documents

applicationProcedure: Offline
Online
documents: Copy of construction worker registration card
Copy of Aadhar Card
Copy of bank passbook for account number, branch name and IFSC code
Disease related Details
Doctor's certificate on format
Medicines original bill
Certificate of being an unmarried daughter or a daughter below 21 years of age

response.schemeName: Ganesh Shankar Vidyaarthi Shramik Puraskar Rashi Yojana
applicationProcedure: Access the official website of the Uttar Pradesh Labour Welfare Board
Select the "Shramik Application" option from the homepage
Register New User and fill out the registration form
Log in to the portal and choose the relevant scholarship scheme
Complete the application form, upload a recent photograph, and submit the application
Obtain a printed copy of the duly submitted application form
Present the application form at the concerned educational institution and the factory/establishment for verification and endorsement
Upload a scanned copy of the verified application form along with the required supporting documents
documents: Attested photocopy of the online filled application form
Read photocopy of bank passbook of son/daughter or worker
Marksheet of High School / Intermediate / Graduation / Masters

applicationProcedure: Family members or dependents of the deceased Panchayat representatives should apply directly through the official website of the Panchayati Raj Department, Uttar Pradesh.
During registration on the Panchayat Kalyan Kosh portal, the dependent must fill out the application form in the prescribed format and upload the necessary documents.
The District Panchayat Raj Officer will download the application submitted by the dependent from their login ID and obtain approval from the District Magistrate after a thorough review.
Once approved by the District Magistrate, the District Panchayat Raj Officer will forward the application form to the Director of Panchayati Raj from their login ID for fund transfer.
documents: Applicant's identity proof
Proof of relationship with the deceased Panchayat representative
Ration card
In case of accidental death of the Panchayat representative, provide a copy of the Panchnama, postmortem report, or a certificate issued by a registered medical practitioner
Death certificate issued by the competent authority in case of natural death

Certificate issued by the Gram Panchayat Secretary in case of the death of a Gram Pradhan or Gram Panchayat member, by the Block Development Officer in case of the death of an Kshetra Pramukh or Kshetra Panchayat member, and by the Additional Chief Officer for the death of a Zila Panchayat President or Zila Panchayat member
Bank account details/bank passbook
Certification record from the office of the elected person
Any additional documents as required
